name: Backrooms: The Lore
description:
Backrooms: The Lore is an online multiplayer survival game where you play as a wanderer who noclipped out of reality. Collect valuables and survive each level to explore the Backrooms.

This game is vaguely based on the Wikidot website for Backrooms and is currently in development. I'd appreciate it if you support this game to help me finish it sooner!
